forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 47. West wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. North wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As night falls over Downtown San Francisco, the city is enveloped in a tranquil stillness, the air cool and crisp with the promise of a low dipping around 47 degrees. A gentle west wind whispers through the streets, carrying the scent of the bay. The sky remains mostly clear, revealing a canvas of deep indigo punctuated by the city’s shimmering lights, reflecting off the tranquil waters beyond. Tomorrow promises to greet the city with sunshine, warming hearts and bringing the high to a pleasant 65 degrees, though the coolness will linger around 63 as the afternoon unfolds. The north wind will accompany this warmth, ensuring a refreshing touch for any outdoor wanderer.

Tonight may feel brisk, so embracing layers is best—perhaps a light jacket paired with a cozy scarf, perfect for a stroll along the Embarcadero or sipping a warm coffee while seated at a bustling café, watching the world pass by. For those planning their Friday, consider a leisurely walk through Golden Gate Park or connecting with friends for an outdoor brunch where you can relish the daylight as it dances softly on the skin. The absence of fog tonight casts an ideal scene for gazing upon the iconic bridges and hills, presenting an invitation to embrace the beauty of the night and the day ahead, promising simplicity and connection among the vibrant city life.
